Description: Red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, interior slightly grooved, with remains of four lines of thickly black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Wangstedt 1963 / Einige demotische Urkunden der Ostrakonsammlung im "British Museum" (no. 7, p. 50.)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51482) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51482)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
